summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3566 , for the improvement of the alley in block 12, Greene's Addition, being the alley between Eastlake Avenue and Franklin Avenue from East Lynn Street to Louisa Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 44759, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
